cause.description:
Tibet is one of places that doesnt have freedom China is taking over (even thought they started 50 years ago) and not letting them have their own religion and customs.They or poorly treated and if we keep feeding China to a certain point they could possibly run us one day as well .
SO FREE TIBET!!!
for more information on Free Tibet go here http://www.freetibet.org/
1. tibet deserves freedom rights as well
cause.mission: to get as many as we can!!! :D
cause.name: FREE TIBET!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
